analysis.description:
PlutoCommyLotto.createNewCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#88-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cicles[currentCicle - 1].numTickets == maintenanceTickets

PlutoCommyLotto.createNewCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#88-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cicles[currentCicle - 1].numTickets == maintenanceTickets
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyActiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#54-58) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)

PlutoCommyLotto.createNewCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#88-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cicles[currentCicle - 1].numTickets == maintenanceTickets
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyActiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#54-58) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyInactiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#58-62) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == false)
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == false)

	- cicles[currentCicle - 1].numTickets == maintenanceTickets

	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == true)
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyInactiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#58-62) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == false)
	- require(bool)(cicles[cicleNumber].isActive == false)
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyLastPlayer (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#45-49) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == cicles[cicleNumber].lastPlayer)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == cicles[cicleNumber].lastPlayer)

PlutoCommyLotto.createNewCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#88-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- cicles[currentCicle - 1].numTickets == maintenanceTickets
PlutoCommyLotto.onlyActiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#54-58) uses a dangerous strict equality:

PlutoCommyLotto.onlyInactiveCicle (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#58-62) uses a dangerous strict equality:

PlutoCommyLotto.withdraw (/unique_chucks/16/0x35dd78b60d5598ae258ec2ea6c610b35115eafe9.sol#178-193) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- numTickets == 1
